combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Perform 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=#f9ff4a>Spectro damage</color>. Gain "Diminutive Sound" on hit.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Mid-air Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Launch a plunging attack in mid-air, dealing <color=#f9ff4a>Spectro damage</color>, and gain "Diminutive Sound" on hit.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: Heavy Attack Tutorial <color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack: Aftertune</color>
combo_teaching.description: Tap Basic Attack after <color=#f4d582>Basic Attack 3</color> or <color=#f4d582>Heavy Attack</color> at a certain timing to cast Heavy Attack: Resonance, dealing <color=#f9ff4a>Spectro DMG</color>. Use Basic Attack after <color=#f4d582>Heavy Attack: Resonance</color> hits a target to trigger Heavy Attack: Aftertune, dealing <color=#f9ff4a>Spectro DMG</color>, and gain "Diminutive Sound" on hit.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Skill</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Launch an attack forward, dealing <color=#f9ff4a>Spectro damage</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: Forte Circuit Tutorial <color=#d4bf5f>Resonating Spin</color>
combo_teaching.description: If "Diminutive Sound" is more than 50 when casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color>, consume 50 "Diminutive Sound" to cast <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill: Resonating Strikes</color> instead, launching a spinning attack forward, dealing <color=Light>Spectro damage</color>. After <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill: Resonating Strikes</color> ends, tap Basic Attack to trigger Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Resonating Echoes</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Liberation</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Concentrate Spectro energy to attack the target area. Cause an explosion at the target area after a short delay, dealing <color=#f9ff4a>Spectro damage</color>.
